an9.9:4.1: “Mendicants, these nine people are found in the world.
an9.9:4.3: The perfected one, and the one practicing for perfection. The non-returner and the one practicing to realize the fruit of non-return. The once-returner and the one practicing to realize the fruit of once-return. The stream-enterer and the one practicing to realize the fruit of stream-entry. And the ordinary person.
an9.9:4.4: These are the nine people found in the world.”
